articles.title: CDC reverses recommendations for holiday season, admits error - WKRC TV Cincinnati
articles.description: WASHINGTON (SBG) - The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention made a reversal Monday on its holiday gathering guidance, leading to some confusion among Americans and medical experts. On Friday, the CDC issued an update on how Americans should safely celeb…

articles.title: With scenes from space, TV series shines light on team fixing spectrometer - CNA
articles.description: LONDON :     Filmmaker Ben Turner has turned his lifelong passion for space exploration into a Disney+ original mini series centred around American astronaut Chris Cassidy. "Among the Stars", a six-episode docuseries, takes viewers behind the scenes with Cass…
articles.content:
